description: Enable AI-driven creation and validation of Eagle CAD components by bridging Claude Desktop with the CAD Model Automation web API. Facilitate seamless interaction with CAD design tools through a clean and efficient MCP interface. Simplify CAD model workflows by providing tools for validation, generation, and previewing of components.

capabilities.name: get_server_info
capabilities.description: Get information about the bridge server and API connection status

capabilities.name: get_cache_status
capabilities.description: Get current status of the symbol documentation cache including age, version, and TTL settings

capabilities.name: refresh_symbol_documentation
capabilities.description: Manually refresh the symbol documentation cache from the API

capabilities.name: validate_library
capabilities.description: Validate a complete Eagle library file (requires uploading the file first)

capabilities.name: upload_library
capabilities.description: Upload Eagle library XML content for validation and preview. This tool provides the preview URL for viewing your component.

capabilities.name: generate_connector_symbol
capabilities.description: Generate a connector symbol using static templates or dynamic generation

capabilities.name: get_symbol_documentation
capabilities.description: Get Eagle symbol format documentation and templates for direct XML generation. NOTE: Documentation is also available as MCP resource 'eagle://symbol-documentation'

capabilities.name: get_ic_pin_placement_rules
capabilities.description: Get IC-specific pin placement rules for optimal symbol layout when generating IC symbols

capabilities.name: get_ic_templates
capabilities.description: Get list of all available IC templates. START HERE to browse templates before using other IC template tools. ANY template can be used as a starting point for customization

capabilities.name: get_ic_template_by_category
capabilities.description: Get IC templates for a specific category with complete metadata including file paths for downloading

capabilities.name: get_ic_categories
capabilities.description: Get available IC template categories with template counts and descriptions

capabilities.name: download_ic_template
capabilities.description: Download an Eagle .lbr library file for a specific IC template
